posts.name: JavaScript
posts.description: JavaScript, often abbreviated JS, is a programming language that is one of the core technologies of the World Wide Web, alongside HTML and CSS

posts.name: Python
posts.description: Python is an interpreted high-level general-purpose programming language. Its design philosophy emphasizes code readability.

posts.name: ReactJS
posts.description: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces based on UI components
